description: time: add note about Parse()'s choice of default year

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

No "time." in package time's docs.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7101046/diff/6001/src/pkg/time/format.go
File src/pkg/time/format.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7101046/diff/6001/src/pkg/time/format.go#newcode640
src/pkg/time/format.go:640: // corresponding to Jan 1, year 0, 15:04:00 UTC (note the default year
(note that because the year is 0, this time is before the zero Time).

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6519eef2c815 ***

time: add note about Parse()'s choice of default year
